name: Twitter - Clear out distracting crud
description:
Remove the following distracting time-wasters from the Twitter sidebar:

- Who to follow
- Trending Topics
- Following (We can just click the link at the top when we need to)
- Promotions
- That explanatory "Lists are..." message that you've already seen a million times

Result: A refreshingly un-cluttered, functional sidebar that needs no scrolling to view.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.
